15594542.program:
bag_exists = query(img, "Is there a bag?")
answer = "no"
if bag_exists == "yes":
    garbage_bin_pos_x, garbage_bin_pos_y = get_pos(img, "garbage bin")
    bag_pos_x, bag_pos_y = get_pos(img, "bag")
    if garbage_bin_pos_x > bag_pos_x:
        answer = "yes"
15594542.question: Is the garbage bin to the right of a bag?
